resources.string: Your device includes access to Alexa.\nConnect your Amazon account to\naccess personalized features.

Alexa allows you to use your voice
to play music and get news, sports scores,
weather and more—all hands-free.
All you have to do is ask Alexa
Alexa, what are some top-rated Indian restaurants?
Alexa, set a timer for 20 mins.
Here are some of the many things\nyou can ask Alexa
To learn more and access additional features,\ndownload the Alexa App.
Something were wrong trying to signout your account
